original_text: Wherefore I gave them also statutes that were not good, and judgments whereby they should not live;
korean_text: 또 내가 그들에게 선하지 못한 율례와 능히 지키지 못할 규례를 주었고

sentences.original_text: Wherefore I gave them also statutes
and judgments whereby they should not live
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것으로 살지 못할 판단을 주었음이라
